The high levels of radiation detected in: 1 were reported, but there is no evidence to suggest that the reactor is on the verge of falling into the ocean.
Tokyo Electric Power Co: Holdings Inc. (Tepco), the operator of the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear plant, confirmed the high radiation levels inside the reactor but stated that there have been no changes to radiation levels outside the unit.
